47 class ScaleComponent {
48 public:
49  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
52  ScaleComponent();
53  ScaleComponent(Transform* transform, const Matrix4x4& scaling);
54  ScaleComponent(Transform* transform, const Vector3& scaling);
55  ~ScaleComponent() {}
56 
58 
59  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
62 
64  const Matrix4x4& getMatrix() const { return m_transformMatrix; }
65 
68  static TransformComponentType type() { return TransformComponentType::kScaleComponent; }
69 
71 
72  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
75 
76  bool isIdentity() const {
77  return m_scale[0] == 1.0 && m_scale[1] == 1.0 && m_scale[2] == 1.0;
78  }
79 
81  const Vector3& getScale() const { return m_scale; }
82  Vector3& scale() { return m_scale; }
83 
85  void setScale(Transform* transform, const Vector3& scaling, bool updateTransform = true);
86  void setScale(Transform* transform, double x, double y, double z, bool updateTransform = true);
87  void setScale(Transform* transform, double scaling, bool updateTransform = true);
88 
90 
91  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
94 
96  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const;
97 
99  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty());

102

105 
107  void computeTransformMatrix(Transform* transform, bool updateTransform = true);
108 
109  Vector3 m_scale;
110

112 };
